Title: #365: 3 Ways to Make a Powershift  with Daymond John
Description:
Making a major change in your life is never easy, especially when you don’t know how or where to start. But each of us has more influence over our lives than we think, says Daymond John, a tenacious entrepreneur, bestselling author and fashion-industry pioneer. In this episode, Daymond gives an inside look at what it means to make what he calls a powershift: shifting your energy to focus on what matters most in order to drive positive change in your life.
